name: Spacesim
body:
Welcome to Space Simulator project

***

This is a siple simulator of gravity flying in the space.
It operates with planets, satellites (planets of low mass) and stars (planets of big mass)
The standard equation of movement is solved by Kutta-Runge method.

This software is based on Pythin3.3 and PyGame1.9

For starting the simulator please use command line:

**python3.3 main.py -f <configuratio>.ini**

or 

**python3.3 main.py -h**

Some configuration files are in the root folder.

During the simulation you can use keyboard:
* q or ESC    = Exit
* p or SPACE  = Pause

Simulation stops when two or more bodies crashes or maximum distance between two bodies getting very big.

***

Have a fun :-)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
